inclusion.criterion: eligibility for the standard immunosuppression of our center
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: tacrolimus, mycophenolate mofetil or mycophenolic acid, dexamethasone/prednisone
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patients with type 1 or type 2 diabetes
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has no underlying disease and is not on any medications. However, he has a severe gastrointestinal illness with laboratory evidence of hemolytic uremic syndrome (HUS), which may be related to Shiga-like toxin-producing E. coli (STEC) infection.
